main event: A sighting of an unidentified object occurred in Vandalia, Ohio on May 9, 1959.
interesting points: The witness observed the object for about 25 seconds,The object was described as blue-green in color and circular,The sighting occurred at 6:15 PM,Conditions of the sky were not specified,The object was reported to have appeared brighter than the background of the sky.
witness description: A 19-year-old male, Station Agent at Dayton Central
